articles.title: Single nanopore sequencing test for over 50 genetic diseases will cut diagnosis from decades to days - Nanowerk
articles.description: A single DNA test has been developed that can screen a patient's genome for over 50 genetic neurological and neuromuscular diseases such as Huntington's disease, muscular dystrophies and fragile X syndrome.
